name: eVa-ai
description: EVA is an AI-powered token tracker designed to keep you updated on the crypto market directly within Telegram. It delivers real-time information on token performance, security audits, and potential risks, helping you stay ahead of the game. EVA empowers users with instant insights, advanced analytics, and crucial updates on the tokens they care aboutâ€”all in one seamless experience. By leveraging AI, EVA provides accurate, fast, and actionable data to make crypto tracking smarter and more secure.
